name: Mondaiji-tachi Ga Isekai Kara Kuru Sou Desu Yo?

quotes.show: Mondaiji-tachi Ga Isekai Kara Kuru Sou Desu Yo?
quotes.quote: I'm not only allowing my comrade to continue to their deaths but I will also follow her footsteps. It's clearly a show of irresponsibility... But those that did not even intend to take the responsibility in the first place can only be called cowardly and despicable.

quotes.show: Mondaiji-tachi Ga Isekai Kara Kuru Sou Desu Yo?
quotes.quote: Not taking the initiative to secure your future but just waiting for luck to come your way, wasn't that just the definition of being lazy?

quotes.show: Mondaiji-tachi Ga Isekai Kara Kuru Sou Desu Yo?
quotes.quote: A fight isn't won once a victor is decided, it's won when someone loses.

quotes.show: Mondaiji-tachi Ga Isekai Kara Kuru Sou Desu Yo?
quotes.quote: If I could sell boredom, I would make a fortune out of it.

quotes.show: Mondaiji-tachi Ga Isekai Kara Kuru Sou Desu Yo?
quotes.quote: You shouldn't judge something without trying it first. Having a variety of experiences is what makes life worth living.
